title: Rain Gauge Outdoor, 7 Inch Large Capacity Glass Rain Gauge Outdoor with Stake and Gasket, Easy to Read Removable Rain Gauges for Yard, Lawn, Garden, Fence (Bronze)
features: Product Includes: You will receive 1 piece of rain gauge with detachable stake and metal frame. With the stake, rain gauge can be inserted into the soil to stay stable, and there is a hanging hook around the top of the metal frame.

Precise Design: The rain gauge is marked with 17cm/7 inch accurate measurement scale for precise rain measurement, equipped with red gasket to help you trace rainfall easily. Using this rain gauge, you could notice the growing condition of plants in garden and check whether they are lack of water.
Premium Material: The rain gauge is made from high-quality glass and iron, which is sturdy and durable, not easy to deform. They are convenient for you to measure the rainfall.

Easy to Use: Put the glass replacement tube into metal frame and tighten it to prevent it from falling, and secure it on the ground or fence. It is easy to know the rainfall by measuring the water volume in rain gauge.

Wide Application: The rain gauge can be widely used to measure rainfall and also be used as a garden decoration. You can give it to your family or friends as a gift to help them know the rainfall, they will take care of their plants better.
description: Color: as shown in the picture Material: iron, glass Product Size: as shown in the detail picture
